channel.title: Noto Peninsula on Yasunori SAWAKI
channel.description: Recent content in Noto Peninsula on Yasunori SAWAKI

item.title: Field trip to Noto Peninsula
item.description: I visited Noto Peninsula in central Japan, where M7.6 earthquake occurred on 1 Jan 2024. I saw the great uplift on the western coast and surface rupture in the eastern area.
